name: proxy-nest
description: ProxyNest is a lightweight Node.js package that simplifies the creation of a proxy server using Axios. It acts as an intermediary, forwarding requests from clients to specified APIs and returning the responses. With built-in support for error handling, request/response transformation, and customizable options, AxiosProxy makes it easy to manage cross-origin requests, handle API rate limits, and enhance security. Perfect for developers looking to streamline their API interactions while maintaining flexibility and control over their data flow
